https://tmrev.io/movie/948073-A History of God 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/nj1ODJM2aW54ttjhhP5hFU4SZ1i.jpg For over 4,000 years, adherents of the world's monotheistic faiths have wrestled with the question of God. This extraordinary, feature-length film, based on Karen Armstrong's acclaimed book of the same name, traces that elusive and fascinating quest. A History of God
